title: Ather Energy plans to set up its 2nd manufacturing facility at Hosur, Tamil Nadu
description: With the new facility, the company plans to manufacture 400,000 units per annum, a significant jump from its current capacity of 120,000 units, it said.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
